turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'm doing good. Thank you for asking. Can I order a pizza from Bella Luna Pizzeria, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, and what would you like on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One pizza Oh, wait. Sorry. Four I'd like to order four pizzas, all four of them large with thin crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One pizza, can I get a.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: veggie lover pizza with peppers, onions, mushrooms, and spinach.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The second pizza, can I get a Hawaiian pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The third pizza can I get a meat lovers pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And the fourth pizza, can I get a macaroni and cheese pizza, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's 4 large thin cruse pizzas, one veggie lovers, one hawaiian, one meatlovers, and one mac and cheese for a total of $60.99.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's Yeah, that good. That's better. That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, your order will be ready for pickup in 30 minutes and you'll get the reciept via text!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, have a great day, bye.
